models.name: AuditStamp
models.doc: Data captured on a resource/association/sub-resource level giving insight into when that resource/association/sub-resource moved into a particular lifecycle stage, and who acted to move it into that specific lifecycle stage.

fields.name: time

type.name: Time
type.doc: Number of milliseconds since midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC. It must be a positive number

fields.doc: When did the resource/association/sub-resource move into the specific lifecycle stage represented by this AuditEvent.

fields.name: actor
fields.doc: The entity (e.g. a member URN) which will be credited for moving the resource/association/sub-resource into the specific lifecycle stage. It is also the one used to authorize the change.

fields.name: impersonator
fields.doc: The entity (e.g. a service URN) which performs the change on behalf of the Actor and must be authorized to act as the Actor.

models.name: EntityRelationship
models.doc: Downstream lineage information about a dataset including the source reporting the lineage

fields.name: created
fields.doc: Audit stamp containing who reported the lineage and when

fields.name: entity
fields.doc: The downstream dataset the lineage points to
